member.name: P:WebSharper.Warp.Url
member.summary: Get the URL on which the Warp application is listening.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Warp.Text(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Warp single page application (SPA) that responds with the given text.
Runs the Warp application and waits for standard input.

member.summary: Creates a Warp single page application (SPA) based on the body of that single page.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Owin.WarpMiddleware`1
member.summary: Warp OWIN middleware. next: The next OWIN middleware to run, if any. sitelet: The Warp application to run. options: Options that instruct the middleware how to run and where to look for files.
